thread.title: Afternoon tea
thread.title_full: Afternoon tea - Review of The Chesterfield Mayfair, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lynne W
title: Afternoon tea
text: Had a delicious afternoon tea with family in this delightful gem of a hotel in Mayfair. Pre afternoon tea cocktails then a Willy Wonka themed tea. Great selection of sandwiches, cakes and scones which were replenished on request. Also an accompanying pot of tea and novelty Wonka juice was served. Friendly and attentive staff completed the enjoyable experience. By far the best afternoon tea I've ever had.
